caption: The apple sways back and forth on its branch. The sunlight filters through the lush green leaves, casting dappled shadows on the vibrant red skin of the apple. As it moves, the apple glistens slightly, reflecting the light with each swing. Nearby, other apples hang quietly, their stillness contrasting with the rhythmic motion of the swaying fruit. The scene is serene, with the soft rustling of leaves accompanying the apple's gentle dance in the wind.
